roleset.name: put military people in a place
roleset.note: STATION-V NOTES: Frames file for 'station' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Placing. (from station.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: usually passive
example.text: The son of a Seagram's executive who [*T*-2]-1 was stationed [*-1]in many countries around the world, Mr. McDonough was born in Tokyo and attended 19 schools in places ranging from Hong Kong to Shaker Heights, Ohio, before entering Dartmouth College.
example.arg: in many countries around the world
